TopicTitle: Why are heat radiators always getting hot?

Articles.Content:
Because of the "stowed issue" I got some small radiators already deployed under the fairing when on the launchpad and they already got ~800K from the beginning, nothing is generating this temperature nearby, the thrusting stage engines are way on the other end of the whole craft ...

Why is it like that?

because radiators "pump" out the energy from the craft.

They cool down the next parts (and they cool down the parts next from them)

So, a radiator cann cool down the whole craft (but slowly)
